bike.description: Contemporary comfort design with hi-tensile steel tubing, includes kickstand and painted steel chainguard
bike.paint_description: F: Daiquiri Blue, Grape Jelly, Tangerine

components.description: Alex Zuma 36H black anodized alloy rims with alloy nutted front hub and Hi-Stop coaster brake rear, 14 gauge stainless steel spokes
Jamis Cruise-control comfort tread 26x2.125" silver stripe
Polished steel arm with 44T compact disc chainring
Cruiser alloy platform with TPE comfort insert
Alloy hi-rise, 180mm quill, 100mm extension, with removeable 2-bolt cap
Alloy micro-adjust, 28.6 x 300mm, with 31.8mm alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
Earth Cruiser Comfort with memory foam padding, synthetic suede top, burnished sides and bumper springs
